name: INUIEditVoiceShortcutViewControllerDelegate
desc: The protocol an object implements to receive notifications from the view controller that edits or removes a shortcut in Siri.

items.name: func editVoiceShortcutViewController(INUIEditVoiceShortcutViewController, didUpdate: INVoiceShortcut?, error: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the user updated the shortcut.

items.name: func editVoiceShortcutViewController(INUIEditVoiceShortcutViewController, didDeleteVoiceShortcutWithIdentifier: UUID)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the user deleted the shortcut.

items.name: func editVoiceShortcutViewControllerDidCancel(INUIEditVoiceShortcutViewController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the user canceled the edit-or-remove-shortcut process.
